participant_abstract.sent: This meeting focussed on the final design of the remote control, including components, properties, materials, and user interface.
The designers presented their prototype model to general approval.
The model was then evaluated according to criteria developed by the marketing expert from the specifications produced at the beginning of the design process.
Financial aspects were considered and some minor changes were made to the design.
The meeting resulted in consensus on design specifications.
The overall design process was then evaluated, with all agreeing that it had been positive.

participant_decisions.sent: Remove scroll wheel to reduce costs.

participant_problems.sent: Original prototype did not meet budget constraints, some additional features had to be sacrificed.
